description:
Fix cfinstance chrome tests.  Before they were either failing to launch
chrome (if chrome itself wasn't installed) or launching the installed chrome
and not the one from the build directory.

TEST=Run *WidgetModeChrome_* unit tests.
BUG=35868


Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=39132

messages.text:
Drive by LGTM.

Thanks for noticing, debugging and fixing this. Hopefully this puts to the rest the long standing CFInstance tests mystery.

subject: Fix cfinstance chrome tests.  Before they were either failing to launch...
